summary: Completed comprehensive testing of NVP Welfare Foundation India NGO Management System with all 16 admin modules. Fixed critical frontend compilation error and verified all new modules functionality.

minor_issues.issue: Email sending requires API keys (Resend not configured)
minor_issues.impact: Email notifications not sent but API returns success
minor_issues.note: Expected limitation mentioned in review request

ui_bugs.issue: Escaped quotes in className attributes causing compilation errors

design_issues.issue: Select component runtime errors in admin forms
design_issues.impact: Minor - forms still functional but console errors present

passed_tests: Backend API connectivity and all endpoints (23/23 tests passed)
All 16 admin modules accessible via sidebar navigation
New modules: Designations, Projects, Expenses, Internships creation forms
Existing modules: Members, Donations, Certificates, News, Activities, Campaigns, Events
Public website homepage with NVP branding and navigation
About page with founder section and Mukesh Kumar Mahawar photo
Stats dashboard showing real-time data updates

success_percentage.frontend: 95% (minor Select component errors, major functionality working)
success_percentage.integration: 100% (admin login, module navigation, form submissions working)
